game.name: Block Pile
game.description:
We are in a world where there is no shortage of fun and pleasure opportunities. However, the main problem is that how can we can reach such reliable sources. When you stay with atmegame.com, we are guaranteed to offer you the best possible fun and thrill available in your favorite areas. Today we have brought to you a brand new arcade challenge where you would get a chance to beat your boring hours with a cute boy who wants to reach high in the sky. Do you help him out? Join Block Pile and be prepared to have the best fun available online!

All you need to do is just control this boy and help him to go to a higher place. Your objective is to pile up as many blocks as possible without letting them color match. Keep your eyes on the screen and do not forget to press the up button if you notice that the color is different from the previous one. In the opposite condition, you have to press the down button. Be fast and try to achieve the goal successfully before the time runs out otherwise you will lose in this pixel online arcade game!
Keep adding up blocks as much as you can to become the top block builder of the city! This boy aims at reaching to the higher place in his life and you are the only hope for him. Give him your support and try not to put the same color blocks together in this html5 arcade challenge! You will lose the game in case if there will be no place to build up the new blocks. Good luck to perform better and create the best score in this new innovative puzzle game!

game.mobileControlKeys: R-ICON TO MAKE THE BOX,L-ICON TO BREAKE THE BOX, DONT LET MAKE THE SAME COLOR BOX
game.webControlKeys: L-CLICK OF MOUSE R-ICON TO MAKE THE BOX,L-ICON TO BREAKE THE BOX, DONT LET MAKE THE SAME COLOR BOX
